com.risk.team.services

Class RiskMapGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.team.services.RiskMapGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RiskMapGraph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This MapGraph class contains all the methods to add , remove countries , continents and also to add , delete edges between countries. This also contains methods to set and get the adjacent countries list.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kartika Patil, Dhaval Desai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
